## Section 1.2

some code in Python

```{python}

import numpy as np  

def softmax(x):
    e_x = np.exp(x - np.max(x))
    return e_x / e_x.sum(axis=0)
x = np.array([2.0, 1.0, 0.1])
print(softmax(x))
```
